Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 33rd overall pick, by Cincinnati in 2015...
Injured on 6/12/2015 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 8/27/2015 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Earned first career win on 9/7/2015...
Injured on 4/3/2016 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 7/21/2016 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/2/2017 with a Spasms Back, out for 6 weeks...
Injured on 8/1/2017 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 6/21/2018 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Injured on 7/20/2018 with a Torn Back Muscle, out for full season...
Injured on 9/29/2018 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 6 weeks...
1/31/2019: Gets a new one-year contract worth $1,928,571 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Cincinnati to Boston on 2/1/2019 (Going to BOS: SS Santiago Collado, P Juan Cardoso. Going to CIN: 1B Raul Rivera, LF Cedrick Fernandez)...
Injured on 4/6/2019 with a Spasms Back, out for 3-4 weeks...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/26/2019, off Timothy Egerton (NY)...
Injured on 9/15/2019 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
1/31/2020: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,992,857 through salary arbitration...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/2020, going 4-0, 1.48...
1/31/2021: Gets a new one-year contract worth $5,992,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 3/21/2021 with a Pulled Bicep Tendon, out for 3-4 weeks...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Houston on 10/2/2021, striking out 11...
Injured on 10/10/2021 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 2/4/2022 to a 5-year deal worth $18,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2022, winning 2 games with a 2.08 ERA...
Injured on 7/14/2022 with a Strained Bicep Muscle, out for 7 weeks...
Injured on 6/14/2024 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 8-9 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/2025, going 5-0, 1.89...
Injured on 8/9/2025 with a Sore Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Chicago to Houston on 4/26/2026 (Going to CHI: RF Kenneth Alexander. Going to HOU: P Juan Cardoso)...
9/21/2026: Signed a contract extension with Houston, $14,000,000 per year, for 2 years.
